short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Stays in the background and monitors web pages for changes.
short.de: Bleibt im Hintergrund und überwacht Web-Seiten auf Änderungen.
short.fr: Reste en tache de fond et surveille les changements des pages web.
short.it: Monitora le pagine Web in background e ti avvisa in caso di cambiamenti.
short.ko: 백그라운드에서 유지하고 웹 페이지의 변화를 관찰합니다.
short.pt_BR: Permanece em segundo plano monitorando por mudanças nas páginas na Web.
short.ru: Остаётся на заднем плане и следит за изменениями на веб-страницах.
short.tr: Arka planda kalır ve web sayfalarındaki değişiklikleri izler.
short.uk: Стежить за змінами у веб-сторінках, працюючи у фоновому режимі.
short.zh_CN: 驻留后台并监控网页变化。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
❗ Update: April 15th, 2024
We maintained PageMonitor since 2015 supporting every Chrome upgrade in that time. Regrettably Google is discontinuing SQL and, in spite of our best efforts, we are unable to deploy a version that is compatible with the new versions of Chrome.

▶️ Page monitoring going forward:
To continue monitoring pages, please install our latest Visualping.io extension to: 
https://visualping.io/chrome-extension/

In this version, the Browser tab allows has the same functionality as PageMonitor and is free.

We are working on a new upgrade of Visualping's extension planned to be released this summer and it will be packed with the most up to date technology to allow you to monitor pages for free using your browser.

♻️ Migration
We apologize for any inconvenience caused by data migration issues as we worked through Google’s discontinuation of WebSQL support. Please avoid closing your browser or triggering a chrome version upgrade until you attempt to migrate.

Detailed instructions can be found in this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yb3E-xFgir4

We apologize again for all the trouble and thank you in advance for your patience as we go through this.
long.de,fr,it,ko,pt_BR,ru,tr,uk,zh_CN:
Page Monitor and Visualping are trademarks of WebMonitoring Technologies. All rights Reserved © 2015 WebMonitoring Technologies Inc. 1900 - 885 West Georgia St. Vancouver, BC V6C 3H4 CA

This is the lite original version 3.4.2. and the only one supported by WebMonitoring. Please write us at hello@visualping.io for customer support. We will answer with 24 hrs.

This extension allows your browser to monitor changes to web pages for you. It can inform you whenever a particular page changes without you having to go and check every time.

To use, simply go to a page you would like to monitor, click on the Page Monitor icon and select "Monitor This Page". You're done! Now whenever this page changes, the monitor icon will display a notification on its badge. Of course, you can repeat this for any number of pages.

Please see Visualping in the RELATED tab if you want to use free email alerts and monitor pages whilst your PC if turned off (Visualping servers do the monitoring part for you!)

In addition, you can change the check interval globally or per page, specify sound alerts, desktop notifications, or visually select specific parts of a page to monitor.

 ✓ Monitor any number of pages for changes.
 ✓ Add pages with two clicks.
 ✓ Visually select parts of a page to track.
 ✓ Smart comparison system that ignores ads and code changes.
 ✓ Highlighting of changes that happened to a page since the last check.
 ✓ Set separate check interval for each page.
 ✓ Set a sound alert when a page change is detected.
 ✓ Custom sound alerts.
 ✓ Desktop notifications.
 ✓ Import and export the monitored pages list.
